column4: Uncategorized;A Chinese man was found naked and dead under his mosquito net covered bed.------ ------This incident occurred at 1:30 pm on January 9
column6: at the corner of the Stupa shop
column15: Khan Sen Sok.------The dead man was identified as YAN WEI QUAN
column16: a 56-year-old Chinese male.------According to local police sources
column18: his friend called the victim but received no answer.  He then went to the residence and broke through the door
column19: only to find the diseased.------According to police
column20: the victim died of heart attack. ------ The body was sent by police to the pagoda at Wat Steung Meanchey to wait for the family to perform traditional ceremonies.------Warning
